Reviews.Title: “Compared to other options, not bad”
Reviews.Author: phillipsrhit
Reviews.Content: american style hotel dont stay cheap frills italian hotel isnt bad parking handy leave car day stay free ac heat summer surcharge hotel pretty hot free breakfast wasnt bad complaint fruit proximity termini metro lines handy decent cheap option rome outdated staff nice helpful
